name: Modified Integrity Impact
description: This metric measures the impact to integrity of a successfully exploited vulnerability.

values.name: None
values.description: There is no impact to the integrity of the system.

values.name: Low
values.description: Modification of data is possible, but the attacker does not have control over the consequence of a modification, or the amount of modification is constrained. The data modification does not have a direct, serious impact on the impacted component.

values.name: High
values.description: There is a total loss of integrity, or a complete loss of protection.

values.name: Not Defined
values.description: This metric value is not defined. See CVSS documentation for details.
